sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' export const About = () => { return (

About

Hello. I am Meron, nice to meet you. Please take a look around.

I am passionate about continuous learning and growth in software development, always eager to expand my technical expertise and tackle complex challenges. As your next intern, I am ready to bring my enthusiasm, innovative mindset, and dedication to excellence to your team, driving impactful contributions and further advancing my skills.

) }
